channel.title: Hearts of Wulin in Chang ge xing's world
channel.description:
[This manhua](https://chang-ge-xing.fandom.com/wiki/Chang_Ge_Xing_Wikia) screams "Try me with Hearts of Wulin!" Anyone tried it yet ?
edit : Come to think of it, it could be a Rebel Crown game, too. Using the reckoning only maybe.
